title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S). Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: The Open/Close project option is not always available. When both P1 and P2 are selected, it is unclear whether the Open/Close project option should be enabled.
EB: The Open/Close project option should be consistently available. If both P1 and P2 are selected, either both options should be available or neither one should be enabled.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Create two projects P1 and P2. 
2. Select P2. 
3. Attempt to close P2 and observe the behavior of the Open/Close project option.
